Package repast.simphony.gis.display

Class GisDisplayMediator

java.lang.Object
repast.simphony.gis.display.GisDisplayMediator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentListener, EventListener, org.geotools.map.MapLayerListener, org.geotools.map.MapLayerListListener
public class GisDisplayMediator extends Object implements org.geotools.map.MapLayerListener, ComponentListener, org.geotools.map.MapLayerListListener
Deprecated.
2D piccolo based code is being removed
Mediator for MapLayer events.
Author:
Nick Collier, Eric Tatara
